text: Years to Burn is the second album by Calexico and Iron & Wine. The artists previously worked together on the EP In the Reins (2005). ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Sam Beam – vocals, acoustic guitar (all tracks except 4) *Joey Burns – acoustic guitar, electric guitar *John Convertino – drums, vibes (track 4) *Paul Niehaus – pedal steel guitar (tracks 1, 2, 4, 6) *Bob Burger \- piano, accordion, organ, vibes (tracks 3, 6), prepared piano, piano organ, vocals (track 6) *Sebastian Steinberg – electric bass, bowed upright bass (track 4), nylon string guitar (track 6), percussion, vocals (track 6) *Jacob Valenzuela – trumpet (tracks 1, 4, 6, 7), vocals (track 6) ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| French Albums (SNEP) | 179 |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Spanish Albums (PROMUSICAE) | 53 |- |} ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Calexico (band) albums Category:Iron & Wine albums Category:Sub Pop albums Category:Collaborative albums Category:Albums produced by Matt Ross-Spang
title: Years to Burn
